title: Iain Duncan Smith – 2002 Speech at Hackney Community College
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Iain Duncan Smith, the then Leader of the Opposition, on 21 May 2002.
content:
I am delighted to be here at the Hackney Community College. Your mission statement talks of ‘working in partnership, widening participation, raising standards and achievement, to meet the needs of the communities we serve’. The hard work of students and staff here have made that statement a reality. Today I want to talk about how that reality can be spread to other inner city areas up and down the country.

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
